price: 3. C’est une chose exécrable pour Allah que vous disiez ce que vous ne faites pas.
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
